hotel-pricerange: What price range of hotel does the user want to stay at?
hotel-type: What type of hotel does the user want to stay at?
hotel-parking: Does the user want parking at the hotel?
hotel-bookday: What day does the user want to stay at hotel?
hotel-bookpeople: How many people does the user want to book for the room?
hotel-bookstay: How long does the user want to stay at hotel?
hotel-stars: How many stars does the user want for the hotel?
hotel-internet: Does the user want free wifi included in the hotel?
hotel-area: Which area does the user want to book the hotel in?
hotel-name: What is the name of the hotel where the user wants to stay at?
train-day: What day does the user want to leave?
train-bookpeople: How many tickets does the user want to book?
attraction-area: What area of attraction does the user wants to visit?
attraction-type: What type of attraction does the user wants to visit?
attraction-name: What is the name of the attraction that the user wants to go?
restaurant-pricerange: What price range of restaurant does the user want to dine out?
restaurant-area: What area does the user want to dine out?
restaurant-bookday: What day does the user want to dine out?
restaurant-bookpeople: How many people does the user want to book a table for?
restaurant-food: What type of food does the user want to eat?
restaurant-name: What is the name of the restaurant where the user wants to dine out?
restaurant-booktime: What time does the user want to dine out?
